data.eml:eml: Validation of the names of eight species of Blattaria according to the Rules of Zoological Nomenclature

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Lopes, Sonia Maria, Oliveira, Edivar Heeren De (2018): Validation of the names of eight species of Blattaria according to the Rules of Zoological Nomenclature. Zootaxa 4379 (3): 436-438, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4379.3.7
